title: What happens if SKT were to win worlds, Again?!
body:
I have nothing wrong with them winning. But this is mainly about the eSports skins.
IF they were to win, what would riot do for the team skins at the end of the season?

Thoughts?

replies.body: 1st team to win two world championship and maybe get another set of SKT team themed skins. Thats probably all there is to it.
They might just release 5 skins for teemo and then turn auto attacks into skill shots.{{summoner:4}}

I mean, I imagine we'd just get another set of skins for diff champs they also main/played/had influence (though that'd be kind of disappointing). I don't know if the players have changed at all since S3. I think they've got a pretty good chance of winning too, as much as I want OG to win. Maybe they'd make a set of 975 tier skins instead? Give them that extra quality? Good chance Riot doesn't know what Riot's gonna do if anything (extra) if SKT wins again.
